page.about.title: About Us - FilmScore
page.about.intro.p1: FilmScore is a project created by two students: Dima Matyushchenko and Misha Efteni.
page.about.intro.p2: We are aspiring Junior Developers passionate about web technologies and cinema.
page.about.mission.p1: The main goal of FilmScore is to provide a user-friendly platform for discovering, rating, and discussing movies and TV series. We aim to create a community where film enthusiasts can share their opinions and find new favorites.
page.about.mission.p2: We believe that sharing experiences enriches the way we perceive art, and cinema is a powerful form of it.
page.about.team.dima.name: Dima Matyushchenko
page.about.team.dima.bio: Specializes in frontend development and creating intuitive user interfaces. Strives to bring ideas to life with clean code and modern design, ensuring the best user experience.
page.about.team.misha.name: Misha Efteni
page.about.team.misha.bio: Passionate about backend development and building reliable, scalable server-side applications. Enjoys solving complex technical challenges and ensuring stable system performance.
page.about.future.p1: We are constantly working on improving FilmScore and adding new features. Stay tuned for more updates!
page.contact.title: Contact Us - FilmScore
page.contact.intro.p1: If you have any questions, suggestions, or just want to say hello, feel free to reach out to us. We'd love to hear from you!

page.movies.title: All Movies - FilmScore
messages.noMoviesMatchFilters: No movies match your current filters.
movie.a-quiet-place.description: A family must live in silence to avoid mysterious creatures that hunt by sound.
movie.avatar-2009.description: A paraplegic Marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.
movie.avengers-endgame.description: After the devastating events of Avengers: Infinity War, the universe is in ruins. With the help of remaining allies, the Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos' actions and restore balance to the universe.
movie.avengers-infinity-war.description: The Avengers and their allies must be willing to sacrifice all in an attempt to defeat the powerful Thanos before his blitz of devastation puts an end to the universe.
movie.black-swan.description: A committed dancer struggles to maintain her sanity after winning the lead role in a production of Tchaikovsky's 'Swan Lake'.
movie.borat.description: Kazakh TV reporter Borat is dispatched to the United States to report on the greatest country in the world. With a documentary crew in tow, Borat becomes more interested in locating and marrying Pamela Anderson.
movie.cap-civil-war.description: Political involvement in the Avengers' activities causes a rift between Captain America and Iron Man, leading to a divided team.
movie.cars.description: A hotshot race car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.
movie.conclave.description: Following the death of the Pope, a secretive conclave convenes to elect his successor. But secrets and political tension threaten to derail the process.
movie.deadpool-and-wolverine.description: Deadpool teams up with Wolverine in a multiverse adventure filled with chaos, humor, and R-rated mayhem.
movie.doctor-strange-in-the-multiverse-o: Dr. Stephen Strange casts a forbidden spell that opens the doorway to the multiverse, including alternate versions of himself whose threat to humanity is too great for the combined forces of Strange, Wong, and Wanda Maximoff.
movie.dumb-and-dumber.description: After a woman leaves a suitcase at the airport terminal, a dumb limo driver and his dumber friend set out on a hilarious cross-country road trip to return it.
movie.dune.description: Paul Atreides, a brilliant and gifted young man born into a great destiny beyond his understanding, must travel to the most dangerous planet in the universe to ensure the future of his family and people.
movie.eyes-wide-shut.description: A New York City doctor embarks on a harrowing, night-long odyssey of sexual and moral discovery after his wife's admission of unfulfilled longing.
movie.fight-club.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.
movie.final-destination.description: After a teenager has a terrifying vision of him and his friends dying in a plane crash, he prevents the accident only to have Death hunt them down, one by one.
movie.finding-nemo.description: After his son is captured in the Great Barrier Reef and taken to Sydney, a timid clownfish sets out on a journey to bring him home.
movie.forrest-gump.description: The life journey of Forrest Gump, a man with a low IQ, who unintentionally influences several historical events in the 20th century United States.
movie.despicable-me.description: A criminal mastermind uses a trio of orphan girls as pawns for a grand scheme, but finds their love is changing him for the better.
movie.get-out.description: A young African-American visits his white girlfriend's parents for the weekend, where his simmering uneasiness about their reception eventually reaches a boiling point.
movie.guardians-of-the-galaxy.descriptio: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior with plans to purge the universe.
movie.halloween-1978.description: Fifteen years after murdering his sister on Halloween night 1963, Michael Myers escapes from a mental hospital and returns to the small town of Haddonfield, Illinois, where he stalks high school student Laurie Strode and her friends.
movie.the-hangover.description: Three buddies wake up from a bachelor party in Las Vegas, with no memory of the previous night and the bachelor missing. They must retrace their steps to find him before the wedding.
movie.harry-potter-and-the-sorcerers-sto: An orphaned boy enrolls in a school of wizardry, where he learns the truth about himself, his family, and the terrible evil that haunts the magical world.
movie.home-alone.description: An eight-year-old troublemaker, mistakenly left home alone, must defend his home against a pair of burglars on Christmas Eve.
movie.how-to-train-your-dragon.descripti: A young Viking who aspires to hunt dragons becomes the unlikely friend of a young dragon himself, and learns there may be more to the creatures than he assumed.
movie.ice-age.description: Set during the days of the Pleistocene ice age, the film centers around three main characters—a woolly mammoth, a ground sloth, and a saber-toothed tiger—who come across a human baby and work together to return it to its tribe.
movie.inception.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through the use of dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea into the mind of a CEO.
movie.iron-man.description: After being held captive in an Afghan cave, billionaire engineer Tony Stark creates a unique weaponized suit of armor to fight evil.
movie.it-2017.description: In the summer of 1989, a group of bullied kids band together to destroy a shape-shifting monster, which disguises itself as a clown and preys on the children of Derry, their small Maine town.
movie.jurassic-park.description: During a preview tour, a theme park suffers a major power breakdown that allows its cloned dinosaur exhibits to run amok.
movie.kung-fu-panda.description: To everyone's surprise, Po, a clumsy panda, is chosen to fulfill an ancient prophecy. Trained by Master Shifu, he must defend the Valley of Peace from a treacherous snow leopard, Tai Lung.
movie.lilo-and-stitch.description: A young Hawaiian girl adopts an unusual pet who is actually a notorious extra-terrestrial fugitive. Together they form an unbreakable bond.
movie.mad-max-fury-road.description: In a post-apocalyptic wasteland, Max teams up with Furiosa to flee from a cult leader and his army in a high-octane road war.
movie.minecraft.description: In a world made of blocks, a young hero embarks on a quest to save his friends and defeat the powerful Ender Dragon.
movie.nosferatu.description: A classic silent horror film depicting the eerie and terrifying vampire Count Orlok and his encounter with a real estate agent.
movie.paddington.description: A young Peruvian bear travels to London in search of a new home and finds a loving family to care for him.
movie.parasite.description: A poor family schemes to become employed by a wealthy household by infiltrating their lives, with unexpected consequences.
movie.pirates-of-the-caribbean.descripti: Blacksmith Will Turner teams up with eccentric pirate Jack Sparrow to save his love and find a legendary treasure.
movie.prisoners.description: After his daughter and her friend go missing, a desperate father takes matters into his own hands to find them.
movie.scary-movie-3.description: A comedy spoof of popular horror movies with ridiculous scenarios and hilarious parodies.
movie.se7en.description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
movie.ratatouille.description: A rat who dreams of becoming a great chef makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker at a famous restaurant.
movie.shazam.description: A teenager can transform into an adult superhero by uttering a magic word.
movie.sinners.description: A suspenseful drama involving crime and dark secrets.
movie.spidermannowayhome.description: Peter Parker's life unravels after his identity is exposed, leading to dangerous multiverse adventures.
movie.starwarsanewhope.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, and a Wookiee to save the galaxy.
movie.superbad.description: Two high school friends try to enjoy their final days before graduation.
movie.narnia.description: Four kids enter a magical world through a wardrobe and help defeat an evil witch.
movie.exorcist.description: A mother seeks help from two priests to save her daughter from demonic possession.
movie.godfather.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
movie.incredibles.description: A family of undercover superheroes try to live a quiet suburban life but are forced into action to save the world.
movie.lionking.description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom after the death of his father, only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.
movie.mask.description: A timid bank clerk discovers a magical mask that transforms him into a manic superhero with cartoonish powers.
movie.matrix.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.
movie.shawshank.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of decency.
movie.silence.description: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to catch another serial killer.
movie.social.description: The story of the founders of the social-networking website, Facebook.
movie.wolf.description: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stockbroker living the high life to his fall involving crime and corruption.
movie.titanic.description: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
movie.toystory.description: A story of toys that come to life when humans aren't around.
movie.up.description: An old man and a young boy embark on an adventure in a flying house.
movie.wicked.description: A retelling of the witches of Oz, before Dorothy's arrival.
movie.zootopia.description: In a city of anthropomorphic animals, a rookie bunny cop and a cynical con artist fox must work together.
